name: Tank Twirl
description:
This is a game made for the Kenney Jam 2021, with the theme Rotation.

Your tank was caught up in an ambush. You managed to fend them off but your engine was disabled. More are surely coming...

Try to survive till rescue comes at wave 10.

The link to the github repo for source code: https://github.com/js1294/Kenney-GameJam-2021
